Well, uh... thoughts?
EDIT: could a mod change the title to "New Read Dead and Bioshock planned"? just gotta get rid of the confusing title

item.title: New Red Dead and Bioshock
item.dc:creator: Lemonz_amp_amp_orang
item.description:
well bioshock 2 wasnt bad, it was just like deus ex Invisible war, it just had too much to live up to

now i dont know if they can pull off the extremely crazy, controversial, and thought-provoking narrative Irrational always cooks up, but i have faith they can at least get the gameplay right (lets face it, Infinite’s gameplay was a missed opportunity, it could’ve been a much more open-world kind of game too)

Read full topic

item.title: New Red Dead and Bioshock
